parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Mods and Addons </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Activates the listed addons. The list of active addons is initialized during this function. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''activateAddons''' [addon1, ...] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [addon1, ...]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[activateAddons]] ["BISOFP"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[unitAddons]], [[activatedAddons]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Jan 21, 2009 - 12:37
<dt class="note">[[User:WGL.Q|WGL.Q]]<dd class="note">
Be aware that "Addon1" is the cfgPatches class of the desired addon to preload.
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 10, 2009 - 11:17
<dt class="note">[[User:UNN|UNN]]<dd class="note">
This command will activate addons that are referenced via scripts but not included in a missions required addons section. If executed from a configs init event with the [[call]] command, it will effectively override a missions required addons, preventing them from being activated (Appears to only happen in multi player). 
To activate the passed addons along with those defined in the mission.sqm, execute the command from a configs init event using [[spawn]] or [[execVM]]. [[User:UNN|UNN]]
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
